subdisciplines.name: Dramatic Literature
subdisciplines.description: The study of plays and scripts as literature, including analysis of themes, characters, and language.

subdisciplines.name: Directing
subdisciplines.description: The art and craft of guiding actors and crew to bring a script to life onstage.

subdisciplines.name: Theater Management
subdisciplines.description: The organization, planning, and administration of theater companies, venues, and productions.
